name: finder
description: Intelligently search codebase for patterns. Supports literal text, regex, file filtering by type/pattern, and context lines. Internally uses glob for file discovery and grep for text search.

query.description: The search query (literal text or regex pattern)

path.description: Relative path to search within (optional, defaults to repo root)

file_type.description: Filter by file type: rust, javascript, typescript, python, go, java, c, cpp, ruby, php, swift, kotlin, scala, html, css, json, yaml, markdown, shell, sql, toml, config

case_sensitive.description: Whether the search should be case sensitive (default: false)

regex.description: Treat query as a regex pattern (default: false, treats as literal)

context_lines.description: Number of context lines before and after match (default: 3)

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 100)

exclude.description: Paths or patterns to exclude from search
